text: Kuma ku yi tattali, dominsu, abin da kuka sami ikon yi na wani ƙarfi,* kuma da ajiye dawaki, kuna tsoratarwa, game da shi, ga maƙiyin Allah kuma maƙiyinku da wasu, baicin su, ba ku san su ba, Allah ne Yake sanin su, kuma abin da kuka ciyar daga wani abu a cikin hanyar Allah, za a cika muku sakamakonsa, kuma ku ba a zaluntar ku
